alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Rapides Parish through 545 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alexandria International Airport, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Boyce, Alexandria International Airport and Timber Trails. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 89 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
